participant_1.background:
I'm worried that my parents will find out about my deployment.
i have a consulting firm.
I love to eat at the local diner because it is close to my house and the food is always good.
I am of a healthy weight for my height.
I have started baking for my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I'm worried about how my family would react if I told them I was gay.
I am proud of my discipline and commitment to my education, despite my sweet tooth.
I'm a young person who doesn't want to continue my family's business.
i work out daily.
i volunteer with dogs.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!  I'm a little worried about my parents finding out about my deployment, but other than that, I'm good.
Oh no! I hope everything goes well and that they don't find out.
Thanks, me too!  What are you worried about?
I'm worried about how my family would react if I told them I was gay.
Oh no! I'm so sorry you're going through that.  I'm here for you if you ever need to talk.
Thank you!  I appreciate that.  I'm proud of my discipline and commitment to my education, despite my sweet tooth.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll do well in school.
Thanks!  I'm also a young person who doesn't want to continue my family's business.
Oh, that's interesting.  What do you want to do instead?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to figure it out.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll figure it out.  I work out daily and volunteer with dogs
